Adam Smith.description: writing and researching for his book on creativity (organizing his research materials for easy reference) @ the Ville:Adam Smith's house:main room:desk

Arthur Burton.description: conversing about Arthur Burton thanking Carmen Ortiz for cocktail ingredient recommendations and discussing tips for mixing a new cocktail, with Carmen offering advice on using lavender and bitters and expressing interest in trying the drink at The Rose and Crown later. @ <persona> Carmen Ortiz
chat: Hey Carmen! Thanks again for those amazing recommendations earlier. I just picked up the locally sourced honey, dried lavender, and fresh citrus fruits you suggested. I’m excited to experiment with the new cocktail recipe tonight. Do you have any last-minute tips before I start mixing?

You're welcome, Arthur! I'm glad you found everything you needed. One last tip: start with small amounts of the lavender and bitters—they can be quite potent. Taste as you go and adjust gradually. Let me know how it turns out! I might stop by The Rose and Crown later to try it myself.

That sounds like great advice, Carmen! I’ll definitely take it slow with the lavender and bitters. You’re always welcome at The Rose and Crown—I’d love for you to be the first to try the new cocktail. See you later!

Ayesha Khan.description: attending classes at the Oak Hill College library (conversing about Carlos Gomez and Ayesha Khan discussing a collaborative project that blends Shakespeare’s works with improv techniques, exploring themes of nature and emotional transitions, and planning to meet to further develop the idea with potential contributions from Francisco and Arthur.) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:bookshelf
